thread.section_title: Grand Hotel du Palais Royal - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful location and exemplary staff.
thread.title_full: Wonderful location and exemplary staff. - Review of Grand Hotel du Palais Royal, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: C M
title: Wonderful location and exemplary staff.
text:
The hotel is located in a quiet street next to the Louvre and the Palais Royal, so no complaints location wise. Within a short walk you can get to so many fantastic sites.
The hotel is beautiful, but the most impressive was the courtesy and professionalism of the staff. Always offering assistance without being intrusive and it felt genuine.
